  • Constructor Details

    • Arm

      public Arm(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorEx leftMotor, com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorEx rightMotor, com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.Servo leftServo, com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.Servo rightServo, com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.Gamepad gamepad)
      Constructor to initialize the Arm with motors, servos, and a gamepad.
      Parameters:
      leftMotor - The left extension motor
      rightMotor - The right extension motor
      leftServo - The left rotation servo
      rightServo - The right rotation servo
      gamepad - The gamepad for manual control

  • Method Details

    • rotateArm

      public void rotateArm(double joyStick)
      Rotates the arm using the joystick input. Adjusts the servo position based on joystick movement, within set limits.
      Parameters:
      joyStick - The joystick input value for rotation (-1 to 1).

    • armUp

      public void armUp()

    • armDown

      public void armDown()

    • extendArm

      public void extendArm()
      Extends the arm to its maximum position. Sets both motors to move to the pre-defined extension limit.

    • collapseArm

      public void collapseArm()
      Retracts the arm back to its starting position (0).

    • stopArm

      public void stopArm()
      Stops the arm and holds position.

    • manual

      public void manual()
      Manually controls the arm extension based on gamepad input. The right stick's Y-axis adjusts the motor position within safe limits.

    • resetEncode

      public void resetEncode()
      Resets the encoders for both motors, useful for recalibrating the arm.
